casebody.data:
Harold Bell Ginn v. Commonwealth of Virginia. October 14, 1974. Record No. 740005.

Present, I’Anson, C.J., Carrico, Harrison, Cochran, Harman and Poff, JJ.

Stuart A. Saunders; Ford, Aris, Scott & Saunders, on brief, for plaintiff in error. Andrew P. Miller, Attorney General; Linwood T. Wells, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, on brief, for defendant in error.

Richmond

Case submitted on briefs.
